name: Tasker AI
headline: Building AI agent automation layer of the internet
description: Building the best AI agent co-worker by giving agents access to tools & the internet

founders.name: Ahmed AJ, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Tasker AI, an AI Agent platform fundamentally re-imaging human computer interactions. Fonder of Dapia global open source open banking API powered by AI agents.

founders.name: Hesham Ghandour, Founder
founders.description:
Engineer, studied Computer Science in Cairo and Munich. Been building software and apps since I taught myself code. 
Got a few games published while in University. 
Built a digital recycling platform in Germany, paid my expenses through college.
Built the first bus tracking application in Cairo. Used BLE beacons on buses, and tablets in kiosks all over Cairo to detect when the bus passed by.
Built Egypt's first Venmo like app that connected to your bank account and transfer money.

generated_description:
**Tasker AI: Your Personal AI Automation Assistant**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Tasker AI is an innovative startup that emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W20. With a nimble team of just 10 employees, Tasker AI has set its sights on creating an "AI agent automation layer of the internet." Their mission? To build the best AI co-worker by integrating advanced AI agents with everyday tools and the internet.

Before diving into automation, Tasker AI initially focused on empowering AI agents to function as the ultimate helpers—streamlining tasks like research, email management, and calendar organization. The company's approach is all about simplifying life and saving time by letting AI handle the mundane.

### What Tasker AI Does

At its core, Tasker AI connects seamlessly with the apps and websites you use daily. Imagine an assistant that helps you:

- **Manage your calendar:** Scheduling meetings and organizing events becomes a breeze as Tasker learns your personal habits and preferences.
- **Conduct research:** It compiles data from various sources, even from those hard-to-reach places, making analysis simpler.
- **Organize your email:** No more inbox chaos—Tasker helps you prioritize responses, ensuring you never miss the important stuff.

### Features and Focus

Tasker AI prides itself on its advanced capabilities:

1. **API Integration:** Leveraging natural language processing (NLP), Tasker can understand your goals rather than just commands.
2. **Advanced Dashboard:** Keep track of agent performance and trends to make data-driven decisions.
3. **Scalable Solutions:** Designed for both startups and enterprises, ensuring smooth scalability.
4. **High Security Standards:** With SOC2 compliance, data protection and security are paramount.

### Community and Development

For developers, Tasker AI provides a scalable infrastructure to build and deploy powerful AI agents, while also fostering a community—TaskNet—where users can earn rewards for their contributions.

In a nutshell, Tasker AI aims to redefine productivity with solutions that marry intuitive design with robust technology. Interested in seeing it in action? You can join the waitlist and explore more about what Tasker AI has to offer at [http://www.tasker.ai](http://www.tasker.ai).

Tasker AI is poised to revolutionize how we manage our tasks in an increasingly interconnected world—a game changer you might want to keep an eye on.
